events.name: American Breakfast Buffet
events.description: Scrambled Eggs, Omelette Station, Breakfast Sausage, Bacon, Waffles, Pancakes, Breakfast Potatoes, Oatmeal, Cream of Wheat, Toast, Bagels, Assorted Danishes, Fresh Fruit - Juices, Tea, Coffee and Decaf Coffee.

events.name: Opening Ceremony
events.description: Size Con's Official kick-off ceremony with short speeches by those behind this one of a kind event!

events.name: Wonderland Way
events.description: Attending SizeCon? Well you'll have to take a stroll through Wonderland Way, filled with size-related props to take photos with, vendors and tons of size related games for you to demo! If you ever need to take a break from the crowd, head on over to Wonderland Way where something fun is always going on!

events.name: The Vendor's Room
events.description: Have yourself edited into a size photo in real time, meet your favorite models, and buy prints, goods and services from our talented exhibitors. This year's Size Con will have a range of products available, including comic books, clothing, figurines, prints, badges, kinky toys, keychains and so much more!

events.name: Newbies Social
events.description: Across the country, and even abroad, we've all gathered here today because we all have one thing in common: OUR LOVE OF SIZE! What brought you to Size Con this year? What do you hope to gain from your time here? Mingle with fellow Size fans and let's get rid of those Size-Con jitters together!

events.name: Escape the Room
events.description:
SizeCon programming expands to include its first ESCAPE ROOM!
An enthusiastic attendee to SizeCon brought along a bottle marked "Drink Me" with the hopes of experiencing their fantasy. Well, the potion may have worked too well because that Con-goer is now missing. Certain items were left behind with clues too small to be seen...unless teams of people are shrunk down to one-sixth their size. Who's willing to take a fantastic voyage and solve this oversized mystery? Can it be done in forty-five minutes before the reduction process reverts? Come to SizeCon 2020 and find out!

events.name: Real Life Expansion Workshop
events.description: Join us for a live demonstration with your favorite expansion models performing live saline breast injections and belly inflating.

events.name: Size Wars
events.description: Compete and don't be beat! Join us for this recurring, competitve game event, that includes crowd favorites like Cards Against Humanity and JackBox Games - SIZE themed!

events.name: Uneven and Extreme Size Social
events.description: Do you like beings who can grow to planetary sizes? Or microscopic tinies? How about growth or shrinking that affects one body part at a time? If you've answered yes, you're in good company! Come join us for a hearty discussion on Uneven & Extreme Size!

events.name: A Tour of the Erotic Edge with Katherine Gates
events.description: Meet Yale-Trained Anthropologist and Author Katharine Gates as she tells the stories behind her popular new book Deviant Desires: A Tour of the Erotic Edge.

events.description: The Eulenspiegel Society (TES) returns with a thorough rundown of BDSM and D/s practices, terminology, and events outside of Size Con to explore your own Power-Play fantasies.

events.description: Furries unite! The furry-size community is robust, unique and growing! Let's discuss our love of size, paws, tails and sharp maws included!

events.name: Underfoot Social
events.description: Whether manicured or hairy, platformed or stinky, this is the one social dedicated to our Foot worshippers! Come and discuss your love of Size and Feet!

events.name: Relationships Panel
events.description: This panel is run by couples, sharing their experiences involving size dynamics in their relationships. The discussion will also include advice on coming out to a partner, exploring and sharing your desires with someone who wants to share in what you enjoy, and the lessons learned over time!

events.name: D&D Campaign: SizeCon the RPG
events.description: There‚Äôs treasure to be grabbed, monsters to tackle, and traps to avoid, but this time our party of adventurers is going to have to deal with a different scale of challenge. Back by popular demand, join some of the best GMs from within the Size community to roll some dice and see just how dangerous a few magic spells in the wrong hands can be! Spots do fill up, so we highly suggest to Pre-Register now by contacting us at: sizeconrpg@gmail.com

events.name: Size History Panel
events.description: How did we as a community get here? Well, it's time you hear it straight from the lips of those who started it all! Featuring Bust-Artist, The-Minimizer, The Reducer, and other special guests!

events.name: Hungry Hunks Social
events.description: Rumbly bellies make you weak, open maws make you moan, and the thought of being swallowed by a sexy Giant man drives you crazy! Vore fans unite and discuss hungry hunks who can't get enough tiny snacks like you! Hungry giants and foolish prey welcome.

events.description: Ever had a partner say something sexy that sent shivers down your spine, or got a text that kept you hard all day? Join Dee for an explicit talk about talking explicitly! We'll cover some different styles of dirty talk, communicating your preferences to your partner, and fun ways to utilize your "filthy voice" - both in and out of the bedroom.

Headlined by the talented and beautiful Raquel Roper, we'll be featuring several acts by our crew of stunning Giantess performers - Entry is free, so don't miss it! Complementary Tea or Coffee is available if you can show Miss Kaneda and Giantess Hex you are worthy. Tips appreciated!

events.name: Inflation & Expansion Panel
events.description: If you're fascinated by body parts swelling out of proportion, sometimes to absolutely absurd sizes, or love seeing characters inflated like balloons, this is the panel for you! Come join a robust discussion with our panel!

events.name: Welcome to the Darkside
events.description: Not for the faint of heart! This panel is for lovers of size-related cruel delights - violence, humiliation, death. This panel will discuss size and the intersection of sadomasochism, self-acceptance, and embracing your sexuality.

events.name: Size Supporters Social
events.description: We know. We're sometimes a lot to deal with. But we know you love us, because you're here at SizeCon celebrating with us! If you are not a size fan but here to support someone, stop by this social to speak with other folks who are also in relationships with a size partner or partners! Share experiences, tips, vent, etc. You are part of the community too, so feel free to participate in a casual, private setting, in a space just for you!

events.name: Size Wars

events.name: Weight Gain Social
events.description: Consensual, intentional weight gain can be a hot button issue. Issues such as monetary the costs involved, lifestyle/health choices and social taboo all play a major role. Feeders, feedees, gainers, and anyone interested in discussing the ups and downs of the Weight Gain community are invited to join us for an hour long group discussion.

events.name: SizeCon Playroom

While some equipment maybe available for use, any personal items (i.e. ropes, toys, etc) must be provided by you. Optional nudity will be allowed after 11PM.

events.name: Stigma, Sexual Variations, & Content Creators
events.description: Sexuality has had a tangled history over the past century, especially when it comes to deviation. However, with the advent of the internet, the ways we express and live with our sexualities have changed dramatically. Why is this? How do people navigate the social minefield of living through making porn? How are sexual variations seen from an academic viewpoint? Join Alex Fort as he describes his exploratory research into the merging of sexuality, society, and science.

events.name: Giant Men & Tiny ladies Social

events.name: Owning What You Love Panel
events.description: Regardless of what area of the Size community we call home, everyone has dealt with guilt, shame, and anxiety over the things they're drawn to. The thought of opening up to a partner about the things closest to our hearts can be challenging. We will examine the various issues that crop up on the road to self acceptance and discuss strategies for becoming more confident in the desires we have.

events.name: Diversity in the Size Community
events.description: As our community grows (and shrinks‚Ä¶ and expands‚Ä¶) more and more people are getting exposed to different forms of Size-based erotica. What does this mean for the future of the Size community? What is the role of the LGBTQ community within the things we love and what unique perspectives can we bring to the table? What can be done to reduce bullying in the community and to encourage women and minorities as creators? What stories would you like to share? Join us for a discussion that aims to give time in the spotlight to often overlooked portions of our world.

Que Grande began his career in adult entertainment on the fringe of the gay porn industry. 12 years later, having produced thousands of scenes and hundreds of films in what is now the mainstream in both gay and straight porn, Grande now looks towards an alternative revolution in the limitless expressions of human sexuality.
